editMealDescriptionEn: This bright cucumber dill salad is so simple, requires only a few ingredients, but packs in delicious flavor! It is quite refreshing.
editMealDescriptionFr: Cette salade de concombre à l'aneth est si simple, ne nécessite que quelques ingrédients, mais a une saveur délicieuse! C'est assez rafraîchissant.
editMethod: Place cucumber slices in a colander over a plate; sprinkle with salt and toss. Let stand for 15 minutes, stirring once. Rinse and drain well.
editTips: To remove the water from the cucumber without greatly affecting the taste or texture, sprinkle salt on the cut pieces of cucumber. The salt encourages the cucumber to leach out excess liquid, reducing the risk that you'll end up with a watery salad.
